name: Arceus LV.X
author: Shizurow

poke_body.name: Omniscient
poke_body.effect: Arceus can use the attacks of all Arceus you have in play as its own. (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)

rule_box:
Put this card onto your Active Arceus. Arceus LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
You may have as many of this card in your deck as you like.
